body_html:
I'm also not sure why the file extension is significant. AIUI, saved_model.pb is a protobuf file, so an application that registers the .pb suffix in order to consume protobuf files ought to be able to consume a SavedModel.

@lutzroeder Can you describe what you're trying to do as a feature request, perhaps? Based on your post, I'm not convinced that the file format "needs" a different file extension, but if we understood more about what you're doing, that would help.

/cc @sukritiramesh @nfiedel
